languages.text: "Наша вера накладывает на нас свое послушание. Каждому электрожрецу наносится множество электу, складывающихся в блаженный контур вольтагейста и позволяющих слабой плоти выдерживать мощь Движущей силы. Потому кожа наша сияет ее светом, а глаза вскипают и плавятся при положении в сан".

"Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."
languages.original_text: "Наша вера накладывает на нас свое послушание. Каждому электрожрецу наносится множество электу, складывающихся в блаженный контур вольтагейста и позволяющих слабой плоти выдерживать мощь Движущей силы. Потому кожа наша сияет ее светом, а глаза вскипают и плавятся при положении в сан".

traits.locale_text: "Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed Voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed Voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

"Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

languages.text: "Unser Glaube erlegt uns eine Pflicht des Gehorsams auf. Jeder Elektropriester erhält mehrere Elektoos, die sich zu einem gesegneten Voltageist-Kreislauf vereinen. Dadurch kann schwaches Fleisch die Macht der Antriebskraft erdulden. Darum leuchtet ihr Licht in unserer Haut, und darum kochen und schmelzen unsere Augen, wenn wir geweiht werden."
languages.original_text: "Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

traits.locale_text: "Unser Glaube erlegt uns eine Pflicht des Gehorsams auf. Jeder Elektropriester erhält mehrere Elektoos, die sich zu einem gesegneten Voltageist-Kreislauf vereinen. Dadurch kann schwaches Fleisch die Macht der Antriebskraft erdulden. Darum leuchtet ihr Licht in unserer Haut, und darum kochen und schmelzen unsere Augen, wenn wir geweiht werden."

languages.text: « Notre foi nous impose un devoir d'obéissance. Tous les électro-prêtres reçoivent de nombreux électrotatouages qui forment un circuit voltagheist béni, permettant à la chair de résister à la puissance de la Force Motrice. C'est pourquoi notre peau brille de sa lumière et que nos yeux brûlent et fondent lorsque nous sommes consacrés. »
languages.original_text: "Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

traits.locale_text: « Notre foi nous impose un devoir d'obéissance. Tous les électroprêtres reçoivent de nombreux électrotatouages qui forment un circuit voltagheist béni, permettant à la chair de résister à la puissance de la Force Motrice. C'est pourquoi notre peau brille de sa lumière et que nos yeux brûlent et fondent lorsque nous sommes consacrés. »

languages.text: “我们的信仰赋予我们服从的职责。每位电僧都携带大量电镀体，它们共同组成受到祝福的电压回路，让虚弱的肉体得以承受源力的力量。正因如此，我们受戒的时候皮肤会发光，眼睛也会融化。”
languages.original_text: "Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

traits.locale_text: “我们的信仰赋予我们服从的职责。每位驭电祭司都携带大量电镀体，它们共同组成受到祝福的电压回路，让虚弱的肉体得以承受原初动力的力量。正因如此，我们受戒的时候皮肤会发光，眼睛也会融化。”

languages.text: 「我々の信仰は、我々に服従の責務を課す。すべてのエレクトロ・プリーストには、祝福されしヴォルターガイスト回路で結合する数多くのエレクトゥーが与えられ、脆き肉体が原動力の力に耐えられるようになっている。だから我々の肌はその光で輝き、聖別された解きにその目は沸騰して溶けるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の信仰は、我々に服従の責務を課す。すべてのエレクトロ・プリーストには、祝福されしヴォルターガイスト回路で結合する数多くのエレクトゥーが与えられ、脆き肉体が原動力の力に耐えられるようになっている。だから我々の肌はその光で輝き、聖別された解きにその目は沸騰して溶けるのだ」

languages.text: «Nuestra fe nos impone un deber de obediencia. Cada Electrosacerdote recibe numerosos electoos que se combinan en un bendito circuito voltagheist, permitiendo que la carne débil resista el poder de la Fuerza Motriz. Por eso nuestra piel brilla con su luz, y nuestros ojos hierven y se derriten cuando nos ordenan».
languages.original_text: "Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestra fe nos impone un deber de obediencia. Cada Electrosacerdote recibe numerosos electoos que se combinan en un bendito circuito voltagheist, permitiendo que la carne débil resista el poder de la Fuerza Motriz. Por eso nuestra piel brilla con su luz, y nuestros ojos hierven y se derriten cuando nos ordenan».

languages.text: "İnancımız bize itaatle hizmet etmeyi emreder. Bütün Elektro Rahiplere, kutsanmış bir voltajçekim devresinde bir araya gelen, dirayetsiz bedenimizin Devinim Gücü'nün kudretine dayanabilmesini sağlayan sayısız elektrodövme bahşedilmiştir. Bu nedenle tenimiz onun ışığıyla parıldar; bu ulvi makama getirildiğimizde de gözlerimiz kaynar ve erir."
languages.original_text: "Our faith imposes a duty of obedience on us. Every Electro-Priest is given numerous electoos that combine in a blessed voltagheist circuit, allowing feeble flesh to withstand the might of the Motive Force. That is why our skin glows with its light, and our eyes boil and melt when we are ordained."

traits.locale_text: "İnancımız bize itaati emreder. Bütün Elektro Rahiplere, kutsanmış bir voltajçekim devresinde bir araya gelen, dirayetsiz bedenimizin Devinim Gücü'nün kudretine dayanabilmesini sağlayan sayısız elektrodövme verilmiştir. Bu nedenle tenimiz onun ışığıyla parıldar, yetkilendirildiğimizde gözlerimiz kaynar ve erir."
